products.title: Lintex Pvc Blackout Steel Grey Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Lintex pvc fabrics provide a nod to industrial styling, the fabric itself have a subtle tile look finish. As these are a pvc fabric they are both flame retardant & moisture resitent making this an extremely durable product.
